name: Mighty & Mini
description:
Creator

Domara Oraham

Controls

W,A,S,D - Movement

Q - Switch To Mighty

E - Switch To Mini

Characters

Mighty - Mighty, is strong and big! Mighty can hold down bigger buttons and push boxes around, Mighty can even use Mini as a trampoline!

Mini - Mini is springy and small! Mini can go fast and jump really high, Mini can also be used as a trampoline for Mighty!
